name: Fake transaction generator
shortDescription: Generate fake credit card transaction data, including fraudulent transactions

Variables.Name: producer_topic
Variables.Description: This is the output topic for the data

Variables.Name: nb_customers
Variables.Description: Input the number of customers to generate transactions for (Min 5)

Variables.Name: start_date
Variables.Description: Enter the start date for transactions. YYYY-MM-DD

Variables.Name: end_date
Variables.Description: Enter the end date for transactions. YYYY-MM-DD

Variables.Name: use_transaction_date
Variables.Description: Use the transaction date as the data timestamp? Yes/No, True/False, 1/0. False value will use date at run time.
